src_original: pṛthivīmapi kampayati /  eko 'pi bhūtvā bahudhā bhavati /  bahudhāpi bhūtvaiko bhavati /

tiraḥ kuḍayaṃ tiraḥprākāraṃ parvatamapyasajjan gacchati tadyathāpi nāma ākāśe /  ākāśe 'pi paryaṅkena krāmati tadyathāpi nāma pakṣiśakuniḥ /  pṛthivyāmapyunmajjananimajjanaṃ karoti tadyathāpi nāma udake /  udake 'pyamajjan gacchati tadyathāpi pṛthivyām /
imāvapi candrasūryāvevaṃmaharddhiko evaṃmahānubhāvo pāṇinā parāmṛśati parimārṣṭi yāvad brahmalokamapi kāyena vaśaṃ vartayati /  ” ityete ṛddhayabhijñāḥ /
“sa divyena śrotradhātunā [viśuddhenā] tikrāntamānuṣyakena ubhayān śabdān śṛṇoti divyān mānuṣyakān,
sakleśaṃ,  niḥkleśaṃ,  parīttaṃ,  vipulaṃ,  mahadataṃ,  apramāṇaṃ,  saṃkṣiptaṃ,  [vistīrṇaṃ],  samāhitaṃ,
sāṅganam,  anaṅganam,  audārikaṃ cittamaudārikacittamiti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /  anaudārikaṃ cittamanaudārikaṃ cittamiti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
iti parasattvānāṃ parapudgalānāṃ cetasaiva cittaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /  [ityeṣā paracittajñānābhijñā] //“
ekāmapi jātimanusmarati /  dve tistrañcatastraḥ pañca daśa viṃśatiḥ triṃśataṃ catvāriṃśataṃ pañcāśataṃ jātiśata[sahastra]manusmarati /

anekānapi saṃvartavivartakalpānapyanusmarati /  kalpaśatamapi kalpasahastramapi kalpaśatasahastramapi kalpakoṭīmapi kalpakoṭīśatamapi  kalpakoṭīsahastramapi kalpakoṭīśatasahasramapi yāvadanekānyapi kalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇyanusmarati-amunnāhamāsaṃ evaṃnāmā /
